meanings.definition: In a manner not officially recognized or authorized.
meanings.sent1: She told her friends about the surprise party unofficially.
meanings.sent2: The students were talking unofficially during the exam.
meanings.sent3: The cat unofficially claimed the new cozy blanket as its own.
meanings.sent4: The sun peeked out from behind the clouds unofficially, casting a warm glow.
meanings.sent5: The secret handshake was passed on unofficially from one generation to the next.

meanings.sent1: The unofficially organized event turned out to be a huge success.
meanings.sent2: She wore an unofficially designed costume to the party.
meanings.sent3: The unofficially declared snow day brought cheers from the students.
meanings.sent4: His unofficially painted mural brightened up the dull alleyway.
meanings.sent5: The unofficially adopted puppy quickly became part of the family.
